title: Coronavirus: Families in lockdown feel the strain
description: When families are locked down together what are the pressures on relationships?
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Families are having to adjust to spending much more time together
We may never forget the coronavirus lockdown. But are we still going to be talking to each other at the end of it?
